detail_desc: Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery and worn details. Zip fly and button, and cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Cap with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket washed cotton denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Longer-style, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and welt front pockets. Lined.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a soft cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable fastener at the back. Lightly brushed trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Slippers in a soft knit with faux fur linings and insoles and knitted soles with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket with a small text print, and short slits in the sides.

Set with a T-shirt and matching joggers in soft fabric. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a casual style and relaxed fit. Easy pull-on waist with covered elastication and a drawstring. Pockets in the side seams, one back pocket, a low crotch and tapered legs with a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length nursing dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons at the top and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a draped effect. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Shirt in a textured cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trims and ties at the sides with round, flat pendants at the ends.
Shorts in stretch denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length dress in soft modal jersey with a wrapover that has gathers at one side for a draped effect.
Fitted blouse in an airy weave with a crêped finish. Pointed collar, buttons down the front and long, voluminous puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the front.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved tops in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede boots with a soft, wrinkled shaft. pointed toes and covered block heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a racer back and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaftless, no-show socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Front, back and leg pockets and a hammer loop on one leg.

Sports top in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the top and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.

Fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a text print and long sleeves with mesh insets along the top.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Scarf in a soft, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180cm.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace yoke at the front.

Short dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Fleece jacket with an appliqué at the top, an unlined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and long raglan sleeves.
Set with a T-shirt and trousers in printed cotton jersey. Trousers with concealed elastication at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.

Metal Alice band with glittery horns at the top.
Bag decoration with a metal keyring and large faux fur pompom. Length 12 cm.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with a frill at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs. Detachable, adjustable braces.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
